author: Zahra Mulroy
title: Why hotels are tricking you with a fake thermostat in your room - and how to override it
text:
It might be there purely for decoration (Photo: Getty) Share Get     
There are some things you expect as standard with a hotel room . 
Hangers you can't steal, a hairdryer, a copy of the Bible, maybe even some shortbread if you're staying somewhere fancy - and the ability to adjust the temperature. 
However, this very last may be outside of your control. 
It's not that every hotel in the world is conspiring to thermo-regulate you for their own mysterious reasons. 
But according to the Wall Street Journal , while the reading on the thermostat may say one thing, it's not necessarily telling the whole truth. Here's why. 
Many thermostats in hotel rooms simply can't be controlled by hand in a move which has been championed by large companies in general for a few years now. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
